name: MediaPortal 1 Extension
summary: An MPE1 file is a plug-in or skin for MediaPortal 1, a media center available for Windows. It can be used to either add a feature to MediaPortal 1 or re-skin the program's user interface (UI). Many MPE1 files are available for download in the Plugins & Skins section of team-mediaportal.com.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
